1: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <sup>4905 </sup> <n>Maschil</n> לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <sup>623 </sup> <n>of Asaph</n> הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <sup>238 </sup> <n>Give ear</n> עַ֭מִּי <sup>5971 </sup> <n>O my people</n> תּוֹרָתִ֑י <sup>8451 </sup> <n>[to] my law</n> הַטּ֥וּ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>incline</n> אָ֝זְנְכֶ֗ם <sup>241 </sup> <n>your ears</n> לְאִמְרֵי־ <sup>561 </sup> <n>to the words</n> פִֽי׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of my mouth</n>
2: אֶפְתְּחָ֣ה <sup>6605 </sup> <n>I will open</n> בְמָשָׁ֣ל <sup>4912 </sup> <n>in a parable</n> פִּ֑י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>my mouth</n> אַבִּ֥יעָה <sup>5042 </sup> <n>I will utter</n> חִ֝יד֗וֹת <sup>2420 </sup> <n>dark sayings</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> קֶֽדֶם׃ <sup>6924 </sup> <n>of old</n>
3: אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> שָׁ֭מַעְנוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Which we have heard</n> וַנֵּדָעֵ֑ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and known</n> וַ֝אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>and our fathers</n> סִפְּרוּ־ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>have told</n> לָֽנוּ׃
4: לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>We will not</n> נְכַחֵ֨ד ׀ <sup>3582 </sup> <n>We will not hide</n> מִבְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[them] from their children</n> לְד֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>to the generation</n> אַחֲר֗וֹן <sup>314 </sup> <n>to come</n> מְֽ֭סַפְּרִים <sup>5608 </sup> <n>shewing</n> תְּהִלּ֣וֹת <sup>8416 </sup> <n>the praises</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וֶעֱזוּז֥וֹ <sup>5807 </sup> <n>and his strength</n> וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <sup>6381 </sup> <n>and his wonderful works</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> עָשָֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath done</n>
5: וַיָּ֤קֶם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>For he established</n> עֵד֨וּת ׀ <sup>5715 </sup> <n>a testimony</n> בְּֽיַעֲקֹ֗ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>in Jacob</n> וְתוֹרָה֮ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>a law</n> שָׂ֤ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and appointed</n> בְּיִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> צִ֭וָּה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>which he commanded</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲבוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>our fathers</n> לְ֝הוֹדִיעָ֗ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>that they should make them known</n> לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to their children</n>
6: לְמַ֤עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>might</n> יֵדְע֨וּ ׀ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>might know</n> דּ֣וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>That the generation</n> אַ֭חֲרוֹן <sup>314 </sup> <n>to come</n> בָּנִ֣ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[them even] the children</n> יִוָּלֵ֑דוּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[which] should be born</n> יָ֝קֻ֗מוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>[who] should arise</n> וִֽיסַפְּר֥וּ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>and declare</n> לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[them] to their children</n>
7: וְיָשִׂ֥ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>That they might set</n> בֵֽאלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>in God</n> כִּ֫סְלָ֥ם <sup>3689 </sup> <n>their hope</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> יִ֭שְׁכְּחוּ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>and not forget</n> מַֽעַלְלֵי־ <sup>4611 </sup> <n>the works</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>of God</n> וּמִצְוֹתָ֥יו <sup>4687 </sup> <n>his commandments</n> יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <sup>5341 </sup> <n>but keep</n>
8: וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִהְי֨וּ ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כַּאֲבוֹתָ֗ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>And might not be as their fathers</n> דּוֹר֮ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generation</n> סוֹרֵ֪ר <sup>5637 </sup> <n>a stubborn</n> וּמֹ֫רֶ֥ה <sup>4784 </sup> <n>and rebellious</n> דּ֭וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>a generation</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> הֵכִ֣ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>aright</n> לִבּ֑וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>not their heart</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>was not</n> נֶאֶמְנָ֖ה <sup>539 </sup> <n>was not stedfast</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>with God</n> רוּחֽוֹ׃ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and whose spirit</n>
9: בְּֽנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>The children</n> אֶפְרַ֗יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> נוֹשְׁקֵ֥י <sup>5401 </sup> <n>[being] armed</n> רוֹמֵי־ <sup>7411 </sup> <n>[and] carrying</n> קָ֑שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>bows</n> הָ֝פְכ֗וּ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>turned back</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> קְרָֽב׃ <sup>7128 </sup> <n>of battle</n>
10: לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָׁ֭מְרוּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>They kept</n> בְּרִ֣ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>not the covenant</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וּ֝בְתוֹרָת֗וֹ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>in his law</n> מֵאֲנ֥וּ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>and refused</n> לָלֶֽכֶת׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to walk</n>
11: וַיִּשְׁכְּח֥וּ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>And forgat</n> עֲלִילוֹתָ֑יו <sup>5949 </sup> <n>his works</n> וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <sup>6381 </sup> <n>and his wonders</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> הֶרְאָֽם׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that he had shewed</n>
12: נֶ֣גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>he in the sight</n> אֲ֭בוֹתָם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n> עָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> פֶ֑לֶא <sup>6382 </sup> <n>Marvellous things</n> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> מִצְרַ֣יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> שְׂדֵה־ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>[in] the field</n> צֹֽעַן׃ <sup>6814 </sup> <n>of Zoan</n>
13: בָּ֣קַע <sup>1234 </sup> <n>He divided</n> יָ֭ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> וַיַּֽעֲבִירֵ֑ם <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and caused them to pass through</n> וַֽיַּצֶּב־ <sup>5324 </sup> <n>to stand</n> מַ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and he made the waters</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> נֵֽד׃ <sup>5067 </sup> <n>as an heap</n>
14: וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם <sup>5148 </sup> <n>also he led</n> בֶּעָנָ֣ן <sup>6051 </sup> <n>them with a cloud</n> יוֹמָ֑ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>In the daytime</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַ֝לַּ֗יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>and all the night</n> בְּא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>with a light</n> אֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>of fire</n>
15: יְבַקַּ֣ע <sup>1234 </sup> <n>He clave</n> צֻ֭רִים <sup>6697 </sup> <n>the rocks</n> בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> וַ֝יַּ֗שְׁקְ <sup>8248 </sup> <n>and gave [them] drink</n> כִּתְהֹמ֥וֹת <sup>8415 </sup> <n>depths</n> רַבָּֽה׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>as [out of] the great</n>
16: וַיּוֹצִ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>He brought</n> נוֹזְלִ֣ים <sup>5140 </sup> <n>streams</n> מִסָּ֑לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>also out of the rock</n> וַיּ֖וֹרֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>to run down</n> כַּנְּהָר֣וֹת <sup>5104 </sup> <n>like rivers</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and caused waters</n>
17: וַיּוֹסִ֣יפוּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>yet more</n> ע֭וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> לַחֲטֹא־ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>And they sinned</n> ל֑וֹ לַֽמְר֥וֹת <sup>4784 </sup> <n>against him by provoking</n> עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>the most High</n> בַּצִּיָּֽה׃ <sup>6723 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n>
18: וַיְנַסּוּ־ <sup>5254 </sup> <n>And they tempted</n> אֵ֥ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>in their heart</n> לִֽשְׁאָל־ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>by asking</n> אֹ֥כֶל <sup>400 </sup> <n>meat</n> לְנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for their lust</n>
19: וַֽיְדַבְּר֗וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>Yea they spake</n> בֵּֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>against God</n> אָ֭מְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>they said</n> הֲי֣וּכַל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>Can</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> לַעֲרֹ֥ךְ <sup>6186 </sup> <n>furnish</n> שֻׁ֝לְחָ֗ן <sup>7979 </sup> <n>a table</n> בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>desert</n>
20: הֵ֤ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> הִכָּה־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Behold he smote</n> צ֨וּר ׀ <sup>6697 </sup> <n>the rock</n> וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <sup>2100 </sup> <n>gushed out</n> מַיִם֮ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>that the waters</n> וּנְחָלִ֪ים <sup>5158 </sup> <n>and the streams</n> יִ֫שְׁטֹ֥פוּ <sup>7857 </sup> <n>overflowed</n> הֲגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>again</n> לֶ֭חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> י֣וּכַל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>can</n> תֵּ֑ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he give</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> יָכִ֖ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>he provide</n> שְׁאֵ֣ר <sup>7607 </sup> <n>flesh</n> לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>folk</n>
21: לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> שָׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Therefore the LORD</n> וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>[this] and was wroth</n> וְ֭אֵשׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>so a fire</n> נִשְּׂקָ֣ה <sup>5400 </sup> <n>was kindled</n> בְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>against Jacob</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אַ֝֗ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>and anger</n> עָלָ֥ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>also came up</n> בְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>against Israel</n>
22: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> הֶ֭אֱמִינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>Because they believed</n> בֵּאלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>not in God</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> בָ֝טְח֗וּ <sup>982 </sup> <n>and trusted</n> בִּֽישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>not in his salvation</n>
23: וַיְצַ֣ו <sup>6680 </sup> <n>Though he had commanded</n> שְׁחָקִ֣ים <sup>7834 </sup> <n>the clouds</n> מִמָּ֑עַל <sup>4605 </sup> <n>from above</n> וְדַלְתֵ֖י <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the doors</n> שָׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> פָּתָֽח׃ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>and opened</n>
24: וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <sup>4305 </sup> <n>And had rained down</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מָ֣ן <sup>4478 </sup> <n>manna</n> לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>upon them to eat</n> וּדְגַן־ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>them of the corn</n> שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> נָ֣תַן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and had given</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
25: לֶ֣חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>food</n> אַ֭בִּירִים <sup>47 </sup> <n>angels'</n> אָ֣כַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>did eat</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>Man</n> צֵידָ֬ה <sup>6720 </sup> <n>them meat</n> שָׁלַ֖ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>he sent</n> לָהֶ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>in</n> לָשֹֽׂבַע׃ <sup>7648 </sup> <n>to the full</n>
26: יַסַּ֣ע <sup>5265 </sup> <n>to blow</n> קָ֭דִים <sup>6921 </sup> <n>He caused an east wind</n> בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>in the heaven</n> וַיְנַהֵ֖ג <sup>5090 </sup> <n>he brought in</n> בְּעֻזּ֣וֹ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>and by his power</n> תֵימָֽן׃ <sup>8486 </sup> <n>the south wind</n>
27: וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <sup>4305 </sup> <n>He rained</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> כֶּעָפָ֣ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>also upon them as dust</n> שְׁאֵ֑ר <sup>7607 </sup> <n>flesh</n> וּֽכְח֥וֹל <sup>2344 </sup> <n>like as the sand</n> יַ֝מִּ֗ים <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> ע֣וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>fowls</n> כָּנָֽף׃ <sup>3671 </sup> <n>and feathered</n>
28: וַ֭יַּפֵּל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>And he let [it] fall</n> בְּקֶ֣רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of their camp</n> סָ֝בִ֗יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> לְמִשְׁכְּנֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>4908 </sup> <n>their habitations</n>
29: וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>So they did eat</n> וַיִּשְׂבְּע֣וּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>filled</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>and were well</n> וְ֝תַֽאֲוָתָ֗ם <sup>8378 </sup> <n>them their own desire</n> יָבִ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>for he gave</n> לָהֶֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n>
30: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> זָר֥וּ <sup>2114 </sup> <n>They were not estranged</n> מִתַּאֲוָתָ֑ם <sup>8378 </sup> <n>from their lust</n> ע֝֗וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>While</n> אָכְלָ֥ם <sup>400 </sup> <n>But while their meat</n> בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>[was] yet in their mouths</n>
31: וְאַ֤ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>The wrath</n> אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> עָ֘לָ֤ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came</n> בָהֶ֗ם וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <sup>2026 </sup> <n>upon them and slew</n> בְּמִשְׁמַנֵּיהֶ֑ם <sup>4924 </sup> <n>the fattest</n> וּבַחוּרֵ֖י <sup>970 </sup> <n>the chosen</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>[men] of Israel</n> הִכְרִֽיעַ׃ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>of them and smote down</n>
32: בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> זֹ֭את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> חָֽטְאוּ־ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>For all this they sinned</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>still and believed</n> בְּנִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>6381 </sup> <n>not for his wondrous works</n>
33: וַיְכַל־ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>did he consume</n> בַּהֶ֥בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>in vanity</n> יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Therefore their days</n> וּ֝שְׁנוֹתָ֗ם <sup>8141 </sup> <n>and their years</n> בַּבֶּהָלָֽה׃ <sup>928 </sup> <n>in trouble</n>
34: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>When</n> הֲרָגָ֥ם <sup>2026 </sup> <n>When he slew</n> וּדְרָשׁ֑וּהוּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>them then they sought</n> וְ֝שָׁ֗בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>him and they returned</n> וְשִֽׁחֲרוּ־ <sup>7836 </sup> <n>and enquired early</n> אֵֽל׃ <sup>410 </sup> <n>after God</n>
35: וַֽ֭יִּזְכְּרוּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>And they remembered</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>that God</n> צוּרָ֑ם <sup>6697 </sup> <n>[was] their rock</n> וְאֵ֥ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> עֶ֝לְיוֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>and the high</n> גֹּאֲלָֽם׃ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>their redeemer</n>
36: וַיְפַתּ֥וּהוּ <sup>6601 </sup> <n>Nevertheless they did flatter</n> בְּפִיהֶ֑ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>him with their mouth</n> וּ֝בִלְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>unto him with their tongues</n> יְכַזְּבוּ־ <sup>3576 </sup> <n>and they lied</n> לֽוֹ׃
37: וְ֭לִבָּם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>For their heart</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נָכ֣וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>was not right</n> עִמּ֑וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>toward</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נֶ֝אֶמְנ֗וּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>with him neither were they stedfast</n> בִּבְרִיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>in his covenant</n>
38: וְה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> רַח֨וּם ׀ <sup>7349 </sup> <n>But he [being] full of compassion</n> יְכַפֵּ֥ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>forgave</n> עָוֹן֮ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>[their] iniquity</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> יַ֫שְׁחִ֥ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>and destroyed</n> וְ֭הִרְבָּה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>[them] not yea many a time</n> לְהָשִׁ֣יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>away</n> אַפּ֑וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>he his anger</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> יָ֝עִיר <sup>5782 </sup> <n>and did not stir up</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>all his wrath</n>
39: וַ֭יִּזְכֹּר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>For he remembered</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָשָׂ֣ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>that they [were but] flesh</n> הֵ֑מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> ר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>a wind</n> ה֝וֹלֵ֗ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that passeth away</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יָשֽׁוּב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and cometh not again</n>
40: כַּ֭מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>How</n> יַמְר֣וּהוּ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>oft did they provoke</n> בַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>him in the wilderness</n> יַ֝עֲצִיב֗וּהוּ <sup>6087 </sup> <n>[and] grieve</n> בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ <sup>3452 </sup> <n>him in the desert</n>
41: וַיָּשׁ֣וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Yea they turned back</n> וַיְנַסּ֣וּ <sup>5254 </sup> <n>and tempted</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> וּקְד֖וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הִתְווּ׃ <sup>8428 </sup> <n>and limited</n>
42: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> זָכְר֥וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>They remembered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>not his hand</n> י֝֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[nor] the day</n> אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>when</n> פָּדָ֥ם <sup>6299 </sup> <n>when he delivered</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> צָֽר׃ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>them from the enemy</n>
43: אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>When</n> שָׂ֣ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>How he had wrought</n> בְּ֭מִצְרַיִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>in Egypt</n> אֹֽתוֹתָ֑יו <sup>226 </sup> <n>his signs</n> וּ֝מוֹפְתָ֗יו <sup>4159 </sup> <n>and his wonders</n> בִּשְׂדֵה־ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> צֹֽעַן׃ <sup>6814 </sup> <n>of Zoan</n>
44: וַיַּהֲפֹ֣ךְ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>And had turned</n> לְ֭דָם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>into blood</n> יְאֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>2975 </sup> <n>their rivers</n> וְ֝נֹזְלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>5140 </sup> <n>and their floods</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>not</n> יִשְׁתָּיֽוּן׃ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>that they could not drink</n>
45: יְשַׁלַּ֬ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>He sent</n> בָּהֶ֣ם עָ֭רֹב <sup>6157 </sup> <n>divers sorts of flies</n> וַיֹּאכְלֵ֑ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>among them which devoured</n> וּ֝צְפַרְדֵּ֗עַ <sup>6854 </sup> <n>them and frogs</n> וַתַּשְׁחִיתֵֽם׃ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>which destroyed</n>
46: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>He gave</n> לֶחָסִ֣יל <sup>2625 </sup> <n>unto the caterpiller</n> יְבוּלָ֑ם <sup>2981 </sup> <n>also their increase</n> וִֽ֝יגִיעָ֗ם <sup>3018 </sup> <n>and their labour</n> לָאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <sup>697 </sup> <n>unto the locust</n>
47: יַהֲרֹ֣ג <sup>2026 </sup> <n>He destroyed</n> בַּבָּרָ֣ד <sup>1259 </sup> <n>with hail</n> גַּפְנָ֑ם <sup>1612 </sup> <n>their vines</n> וְ֝שִׁקְמוֹתָ֗ם <sup>8256 </sup> <n>and their sycomore trees</n> בַּֽחֲנָמַֽל׃ <sup>2602 </sup> <n>with frost</n>
48: וַיַּסְגֵּ֣ר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>He gave up</n> לַבָּרָ֣ד <sup>1259 </sup> <n>also to the hail</n> בְּעִירָ֑ם <sup>1165 </sup> <n>their cattle</n> וּ֝מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>4735 </sup> <n>and their flocks</n> לָרְשָׁפִֽים׃ <sup>7565 </sup> <n>to hot thunderbolts</n>
49: יְשַׁלַּח־ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>He cast</n> בָּ֨ם ׀ חֲר֬וֹן <sup>2740 </sup> <n>upon them the fierceness</n> אַפּ֗וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>of his anger</n> עֶבְרָ֣ה <sup>5678 </sup> <n>wrath</n> וָזַ֣עַם <sup>2195 </sup> <n>and indignation</n> וְצָרָ֑ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>and trouble</n> מִ֝שְׁלַ֗חַת <sup>4917 </sup> <n>by sending</n> מַלְאֲכֵ֥י <sup>4397 </sup> <n>angels</n> רָעִֽים׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n>
50: יְפַלֵּ֥ס <sup>6424 </sup> <n>He made</n> נָתִ֗יב <sup>5410 </sup> <n>a way</n> לְאַ֫פּ֥וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>to his anger</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> חָשַׂ֣ךְ <sup>2820 </sup> <n>he spared</n> מִמָּ֣וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>from death</n> נַפְשָׁ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>not their soul</n> וְ֝חַיָּתָ֗ם <sup>2416 </sup> <n>their life</n> לַדֶּ֥בֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>to the pestilence</n> הִסְגִּֽיר׃ <sup>5462 </sup> <n>over</n>
51: וַיַּ֣ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And smote</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בְּכ֣וֹר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>all the firstborn</n> בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>in Egypt</n> רֵאשִׁ֥ית <sup>7225 </sup> <n>the chief</n> א֝וֹנִ֗ים <sup>202 </sup> <n>of [their] strength</n> בְּאָהֳלֵי־ <sup>168 </sup> <n>in the tabernacles</n> חָֽם׃ <sup>2526 </sup> <n>of Ham</n>
52: וַיַּסַּ֣ע <sup>5265 </sup> <n>to go forth</n> כַּצֹּ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>like sheep</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>But made his own people</n> וַֽיְנַהֲגֵ֥ם <sup>5090 </sup> <n>and guided</n> כַּ֝עֵ֗דֶר <sup>5739 </sup> <n>like a flock</n> בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>them in the wilderness</n>
53: וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם <sup>5148 </sup> <n>And he led</n> לָ֭בֶטַח <sup>983 </sup> <n>them on safely</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> פָחָ֑דוּ <sup>6342 </sup> <n>so that they feared</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> א֝וֹיְבֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>their enemies</n> כִּסָּ֥ה <sup>3680 </sup> <n>overwhelmed</n> הַיָּֽם׃ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>not but the sea</n>
54: וַ֭יְבִיאֵם <sup>935 </sup> <n>And he brought</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> גְּב֣וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>them to the border</n> קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>of his sanctuary</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>[even to] this mountain</n> זֶ֝֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> קָנְתָ֥ה <sup>7069 </sup> <n>had purchased</n> יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>[which] his right hand</n>
55: וַיְגָ֤רֶשׁ <sup>1644 </sup> <n>He cast out</n> מִפְּנֵיהֶ֨ם ׀ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>also before</n> גּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the heathen</n> וַֽ֭יַּפִּילֵם <sup>5307 </sup> <n>them and divided</n> בְּחֶ֣בֶל <sup>2256 </sup> <n>by line</n> נַחֲלָ֑ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>them an inheritance</n> וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>to dwell</n> בְּ֝אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>168 </sup> <n>in their tents</n> שִׁבְטֵ֥י <sup>7626 </sup> <n>and made the tribes</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
56: וַיְנַסּ֣וּ <sup>5254 </sup> <n>Yet they tempted</n> וַ֭יַּמְרוּ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>and provoked</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> עֶלְי֑וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>the most high</n> וְ֝עֵדוֹתָ֗יו <sup>5713 </sup> <n>not his testimonies</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> שָׁמָֽרוּ׃ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and kept</n>
57: וַיִּסֹּ֣גוּ <sup>5472 </sup> <n>But turned back</n> וַֽ֭יִּבְגְּדוּ <sup>898 </sup> <n>and dealt unfaithfully</n> כַּאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>like their fathers</n> נֶ֝הְפְּכ֗וּ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>they were turned aside</n> כְּקֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>bow</n> רְמִיָּֽה׃ <sup>7423 </sup> <n>like a deceitful</n>
58: וַיַּכְעִיס֥וּהוּ <sup>3707 </sup> <n>For they provoked him to anger</n> בְּבָמוֹתָ֑ם <sup>1116 </sup> <n>with their high places</n> וּ֝בִפְסִילֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>6456 </sup> <n>with their graven images</n> יַקְנִיאֽוּהוּ׃ <sup>7065 </sup> <n>and moved him to jealousy</n>
59: שָׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>When God</n> וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֑ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>[this] he was wroth</n> וַיִּמְאַ֥ס <sup>3988 </sup> <n>abhorred</n> מְ֝אֹ֗ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>and greatly</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n>
60: וַ֭יִּטֹּשׁ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>So that he forsook</n> מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <sup>4908 </sup> <n>the tabernacle</n> שִׁל֑וֹ <sup>7887 </sup> <n>of Shiloh</n> אֹ֝֗הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>the tent</n> שִׁכֵּ֥ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>[which] he placed</n> בָּאָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>among men</n>
61: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And delivered</n> לַשְּׁבִ֣י <sup>7628 </sup> <n>into captivity</n> עֻזּ֑וֹ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>his strength</n> וְֽתִפְאַרְתּ֥וֹ <sup>8597 </sup> <n>and his glory</n> בְיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> צָֽר׃ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>into the enemy's</n>
62: וַיַּסְגֵּ֣ר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>over</n> לַחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>also unto the sword</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> וּ֝בְנַחֲלָת֗וֹ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>with his inheritance</n> הִתְעַבָּֽר׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and was wroth</n>
63: בַּחוּרָ֥יו <sup>970 </sup> <n>their young men</n> אָֽכְלָה־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>consumed</n> אֵ֑שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>The fire</n> וּ֝בְתוּלֹתָ֗יו <sup>1330 </sup> <n>and their maidens</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>had no</n> הוּלָּֽלוּ׃ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>were not given to marriage</n>
64: כֹּ֭הֲנָיו <sup>3548 </sup> <n>Their priests</n> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> נָפָ֑לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fell</n> וְ֝אַלְמְנֹתָ֗יו <sup>490 </sup> <n>and their widows</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִבְכֶּֽינָה׃ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>made no lamentation</n>
65: וַיִּקַ֖ץ <sup>3364 </sup> <n>awaked</n> כְּיָשֵׁ֥ן ׀ <sup>3463 </sup> <n>as one out of sleep</n> אֲדֹנָ֑י <sup>136 </sup> <n>Then the Lord</n> כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>[and] like a mighty man</n> מִתְרוֹנֵ֥ן <sup>7442 </sup> <n>that shouteth</n> מִיָּֽיִן׃ <sup>3196 </sup> <n>by reason of wine</n>
66: וַיַּךְ־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And he smote</n> צָרָ֥יו <sup>6862 </sup> <n>his enemies</n> אָח֑וֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>in the hinder parts</n> חֶרְפַּ֥ת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>reproach</n> ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>them to a perpetual</n> נָ֣תַן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he put</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
67: וַ֭יִּמְאַס <sup>3988 </sup> <n>Moreover he refused</n> בְּאֹ֣הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>the tabernacle</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph</n> וּֽבְשֵׁ֥בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>not the tribe</n> אֶ֝פְרַ֗יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> בָחָֽר׃ <sup>977 </sup> <n>and chose</n>
68: וַ֭יִּבְחַר <sup>977 </sup> <n>But chose</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵׁ֣בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>the tribe</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַ֥ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mount</n> צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָהֵֽב׃ <sup>157 </sup> <n>which he loved</n>
69: וַיִּ֣בֶן <sup>1129 </sup> <n>And he built</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> רָ֭מִים <sup>7311 </sup> <n>like high</n> מִקְדָּשׁ֑וֹ <sup>4720 </sup> <n>his sanctuary</n> כְּ֝אֶ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[palaces] like the earth</n> יְסָדָ֥הּ <sup>3245 </sup> <n>which he hath established</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
70: וַ֭יִּבְחַר <sup>977 </sup> <n>He chose</n> בְּדָוִ֣ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> עַבְדּ֑וֹ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>also his servant</n> וַ֝יִּקָּחֵ֗הוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> מִֽמִּכְלְאֹ֥ת <sup>4356 </sup> <n>fold</n> צֹֽאן׃ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>cattle</n>
71: מֵאַחַ֥ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>From following</n> עָל֗וֹת <sup>5763 </sup> <n>the ewes great with young</n> הֱ֫בִיא֥וֹ <sup>935 </sup> <n>he brought</n> לִ֭רְעוֹת <sup>7462 </sup> <n>him to feed</n> בְּיַעֲקֹ֣ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> וּ֝בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>his inheritance</n>
72: וַ֭יִּרְעֵם <sup>7462 </sup> <n>So he fed</n> כְּתֹ֣ם <sup>8537 </sup> <n>them according to the integrity</n> לְבָב֑וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>of his heart</n> וּבִתְבוּנ֖וֹת <sup>8394 </sup> <n>them by the skilfulness</n> כַּפָּ֣יו <sup>3709 </sup> <n>of his hands</n> יַנְחֵֽם׃ <sup>5148 </sup> <n>and guided</n>
